description: Search for agent skills matching specific tags. Uses regex pattern matching to find skills with matching tags. The tag parameter should be formatted as a regex pattern (e.g., '.*finance.*' to match tags containing 'finance').

configuration.query: FROM agent_skills | EVAL tags_str = MV_CONCAT(tags, ",") | WHERE tags_str RLIKE ?tag | KEEP skill_id, name, domain, tags, short_description

tag.description: Regex pattern to match against skill tags (e.g., '.*finance.*', '.*compliance.*'). The pattern will be matched against a comma-separated string of all tags.
